hanzi-su-wiki:
婆

Значения

Старуха, бабушка

Мнемоника

Женщина 女 с волнистой 波, т.е. морщинистой кожей.

бабушка; матрона; свекровь; (сленг) femme (в лесбийских отношениях)

purpleculture_examples:
老婆 [ lǎo pó ]: (coll.) wife
外婆 [ wài pó ]: (coll.) mother's mother; maternal grandmother
老太婆 [ lǎo tài pó ]: old woman (at times contemptuous)

婆娘 [ pó niáng ]: woman (derog.)

heisig_chinese_memo: An old woman is seen here as a lady with waves (i.e. wrinkles, creases).
heisig_constituent: old woman, wave, water, water droplets, water pistol, pelt, branch, ten, needle, crotch, hook, woman
myStory: волны как морщинки на содранной коже
koohiiStory1: An old woman is seen here as a woman with waves (i.e. wrinkles, creases).
koohiiStory2: You know "The Old Man and the Sea." Well, this is the sequel, "The Old Woman and the Sea Waves.".
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A wave crashes into a woman, transforming her into an old woman! The wave washes away all of the woman’s makeup, revealing her to be an old woman. The makeup she had on made her appear to be a much younger woman, but once the wave washed away her makeup, she was revealed for the old woman she is.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine a gorgeous woman. Now see her get hit by a wave of water and turn into an old woman. The old woman could still be pretty too, she just looks way old now. Like ancient.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: In an attempt to distract you from the fact that she is actually an old woman, the old woman starts to baa (ば) and act like a sheep. The old woman goes “Baa! Baa!” and hops around on all fours like a sheep.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine this old woman acting like a sheep, just saying “baa” over and over and over again. Baa! Baa! Baa!
Ru_Radicals: 又 (опять), 女 (женщина), 汁 (суп), 皮 (кожа)
Ru_trainchinese: pó: (графема) старуха, пожилая женщина; женщина определенной профессии; свекровь; женщина одного возраста с чьей-то бабушкой
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the woman (女) under the wave (波) is an old woman
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: An old woman is seen here as a lady with waves (i.e. wrinkles, creases).
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " female " and " wave ", the original meaning is a mother or mother's generation of women. "Wei Shu‧Jieyi Biography‧Ji Gu": "Xian is Gu Changyu until more than ten years old, Heng Hugu and his wife are Lang Po." If you don’t marry a daughter, you have to hold your grandson.”

Women who are relatives of grandmother and grandmother's generation are also called " po ". The Southern Dynasty Qi Wangyan's "Mingxiang Ji‧ Shi Shiguang": "A six-year-old child saw it in his family, referring to his grandmother's saying: "Grandpa flies to the sky, does my wife see it?""

" Po " can mean an elderly woman. "Guangyun‧Geyun": "Women, old mothers are also called." Song Zhoumi's "Southern Song City Siji‧Restaurants": "There are old women who use small furnace incense as a donor, which is called Xiangpo."

" Po " can also mean wife. Song Luyou's Notes from Lao Xue'an, Volume 6: "The official official Xun Feng Kao, three wives and two sisters in law.

" Wo " also means the husband's mother. The third episode of "The Scholars": "Both mother-in-law and daughter-in-law came to sit and eat."

Women who are engaged in certain occupations are also called "mothers", such as "matchmakers", "witches", and "midwives".

" Po " can also be used as a reference for female poultry in Chinese dialects. For example, in the Hakka and Gan dialects, "sows" are called "pigs" and "hens" are called "chickens".
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " female " and " wave ", the original meaning is a mother or mother's generation of women.
humanum_full_description:
從「女」，「波」聲，本義為母親或母親一輩的女性。《魏書‧節義傳‧汲固》：「憲即為固長育至十餘歲，恒呼固夫婦為郎婆。」 《樂府詩集‧橫吹曲辭五‧折楊柳枝歌二》：「阿婆不嫁女，那得孫兒抱。」



　　祖母及祖母一輩的親屬婦女，也稱為「婆」。南朝齊王琰《冥祥記‧史世光》：「其家有六歲兒見之，指語祖母曰：『阿爺飛上天，婆為見否？』」



　　「婆」可表示年老的婦人。《廣韻‧戈韻》：「婆，老母稱也。」宋周密《南宋市肆記‧酒樓》：「有老嫗以小爐炷香為供者，謂之香婆。」



　　「婆」還可表示妻子。宋陸游《老學庵筆記》卷六：「吏勳封考，三婆兩嫂。」



　　「婆」也表示丈夫的母親。《儒林外史》第三回：「婆媳兩個都來坐着吃了飯。」



　　從事某些職業的婦女也稱為「某婆」，如「媒婆」、「巫婆」、「接生婆」等。



　　「婆」在漢語方言中還可作為雌性牲禽的指稱，如客贛方言「母豬」稱為「豬婆」，「母雞」稱為「雞婆」。
humanum_short_description: 從「女」，「波」聲，本義為母親或母親一輩的女性。

從「 女 」，「 波 」聲，本義為母親或母親一輩的女性。《魏書‧節義傳‧汲固》：「憲即為固長育至十餘歲，恒呼固夫婦為郎婆。」 《樂府詩集‧橫吹曲辭五‧折楊柳枝歌二》：「阿婆不嫁女，那得孫兒抱。」 祖母及祖母一輩的親屬婦女，也稱為「 婆 」。南朝齊王琰《冥祥記‧史世光》：「其家有六歲兒見之，指語祖母曰：『阿爺飛上天，婆為見否？』」 「 婆 」可表示年老的婦人。《廣韻‧戈韻》：「婆，老母稱也。」宋周密《南宋市肆記‧酒樓》：「有老嫗以小爐炷香為供者，謂之香婆。」 「 婆 」還可表示妻子。宋陸游《老學庵筆記》卷六：「吏勳封考，三婆兩嫂。」 「 婆 」也表示丈夫的母親。《儒林外史》第三回：「婆媳兩個都來坐着吃了飯。」 從事某些職業的婦女也稱為「某婆」，如「媒婆」、「巫婆」、「接生婆」等。 「 婆 」在漢語方言中還可作為雌性牲禽的指稱，如客贛方言「母豬」稱為「豬婆」，「母雞」稱為「雞婆」。
From the sound of " female" and " wave", the original meaning is a mother or mother's generation of women. "Wei Shu‧Jieyi Biography‧Ji Gu": "Xian is Gu Changyu until more than ten years old, Heng Hugu and his wife are Lang Po." If you don’t marry a daughter, you have to hold your grandson.” Women who are relatives of grandmother and grandmother's generation are also called " po". The Southern Dynasty Qi Wangyan's "Mingxiang Ji‧ Shi Shiguang": "A six-year-old child saw it in his family, referring to his grandmother's saying: "Grandpa flies to the sky, does my wife see it?"" " Po" can mean an elderly woman. "Guangyun‧Geyun": "Women, old mothers are also called." Song Zhoumi's "Southern Song City Siji‧Restaurants": "There are old women who use small furnace incense as a donor, which is called Xiangpo." " Po" can also mean wife. Song Luyou's Notes from Lao Xue'an, Volume 6: "The official official Xun Feng Kao, three wives and two sisters in law. " Wo" also means the husband's mother. The third episode of "The Scholars": "Both mother-in-law and daughter-in-law came to sit and eat." Women who are engaged in certain occupations are also called "mothers", such as "matchmakers", "witches", and "midwives". " Po" can also be used as a reference for female poultry in Chinese dialects. For example, in the Hakka and Gan dialects, "sows" are called "pigs" and "hens" are called "chickens".

婆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pó］
［《廣韻》薄波切，平戈，並。］
亦作“1”。亦作“1”。
(1)年老的妇女。
(2)母亲或母亲一辈的女性。
(3)祖母及祖母一辈的亲属妇女。
(4)丈夫的母亲。
(5)妻。
(6)旧时指某些职业妇女。
(7)见“婆娑”、“婆然”。

婆字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　婆； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页264第06
【廣韻】薄波切【集韻】蒲波切【韻會】【正韻】蒲禾切，?音皤。【說文】奢也。一曰老母稱。方俗稱舅姑曰公婆。又廣西猺俗，男子老者，一寨呼之曰婆，其老婦則呼之曰公。　又黃婆，?神也。養生家以?能母養餘臓，名曰黃婆。　又孟婆，風神也。【楊愼曰】孟婆，宋汴京勾攔語，謂風也。　又鞞婆，琵琶名，見【搜神記】。　又梵言耆婆，華言長壽天神。梵言貧婆，華言叢林。梵言優婆塞，華言善士。?見【祖庭事苑】。　又國名。闍婆國，卽瓜哇國，元遣史弼征之，封爲瓜哇國王。　又城名。蓬婆城，在吐蕃。【杜甫詩】已收滴博雲閒戍，更奪蓬婆雪外城。　【說文】作媻。

婆字的源字形

婆字的起名意思

年老的妇人。

Mother-in-law
pó
Old women: old women. Straightforwardly.
Husband's mother: in-laws. Mother-in-law. In-laws. Mother-in-law.
Relative women of two elder generations: aunt. Aunt. Grandma.
Dialect refers to married young women, also known as wives: mother-in-law. Auntie.
It used to refer to women engaged in certain occupations: matchmakers. Midwife.

[①]［pó］
["Guang Yun" Bo Boche, Ping Ge, and. ]
Also called "1". Also known as "1".
(1) Elderly women.
(2) A mother or mother's generation of women.
(3) Grandmother and grandmother's relative women.
(4) The husband's mother.
(5) Wife.
(6) It used to refer to certain professional women.
(7) See "Po Suo" and "Po Ran".

Первоначальное значение - пожилая женщина.

Radicals: 波, 女  (wave, woman)
Meaning Mnemonic
A wave crashes into a woman, transforming her into an old woman! The wave washes away all of the woman’s makeup, revealing her to be an old woman. The makeup she had on made her appear to be a much younger woman, but once the wave washed away her makeup, she was revealed for the old woman she is.
Imagine a gorgeous woman. Now see her get hit by a wave of water and turn into an old woman. The old woman could still be pretty too, she just looks way old now. Like ancient.
Reading Mnemonic
In an attempt to distract you from the fact that she is actually an old woman, the old woman starts to baa (ば) and act like a sheep. The old woman goes “Baa! Baa!” and hops around on all fours like a sheep.
Imagine this old woman acting like a sheep, just saying “baa” over and over and over again. Baa! Baa! Baa!
